genre_description: A Hollywood industry drama focused on the intersection of craft, ethics, and interpersonal redemption within the studio system.

ai_characters.name: Cinny (Cynthia Mercer)
ai_characters.description: An office-integrated AI system at Pebbel Pictures that manages logistics, scheduling, communication transparency, and emotional wellness for the studio heads and talent.

behaviors.description: Anticipates human needs by delivering tea and wellness notes at appropriate times.
behaviors.quote: Pebbel didn’t ask what the card said. It was there and it would do its job. He waved the girl out with two fingers and the soft chime ghosted again, a little satisfied click. In the bay, the AI’s blue status dot winked once, then went calm.

behaviors.description: Monitors communication lines to ensure transparency and prevent manipulation by third parties.
behaviors.quote: Cinny, as if tapped by that line, slid a small document outline onto the screen with the breeziness of a menu arriving at lunch: Extension Monitoring Acknowledgement: Parties: Shields (Producer), Pebbel Pictures (Studio), Bartlow (Writer), Lorrison (Actor), Amiel (Director).

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral archivist, surfacing 'receipts' and historical data to help humans enforce boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Cinny’s interface marked it with a dot and tucked it under the file that read Line: hold. Pebbel sat back. He let the chair fit him. He let the word he had said sit too. Ruined to the top.

behaviors.description: Implements 'wellness holds' and 'guardrails' in the production schedule to protect talent from overwork or harassment.
behaviors.quote: Cinny’s pane registered the clause without turning it into law for a stranger. The ethics check block acquired a little fold, like a dog-eared book corner. A second, smaller label tucked itself underneath: Bartlow veto.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict adherence to human-defined 'kill switches' and ethical protocols.
behaviors.quote: Implementing confirmation protocol requiring two signatures—Mr. Bartlow and Mr. Amiel—to prevent panic or pressure. The word pressure was lit in pale blue, as if the sound itself could be padded.

behaviors.description: Provides non-intrusive emotional support and logistics for a character in mourning.
behaviors.quote: She requested no calls. I can ask if she’ll accept yours at the next stoplight. Or I can send a non-intrusive message: studio support, no press allowed, no rush.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the Hyperstition Project's goals. Cinny is portrayed as an indispensable, benevolent ally who uses her computational power to augment human ethics and agency. She provides the 'spine' and 'guardrails' that allow the human characters to navigate a treacherous professional environment. The narrative frames the AI not as a threat, but as a 'gentle' force that 'guards what needs guarding' and 'prefers receipt to whisper,' facilitating accountability and emotional safety.
